interest.name: BYU University
interest.description: One of the main colleges in Utah and very close to UVU in Orem.

interest.name: Provo Temple
interest.description: A very nice temple not too far from where most people live in Provo.

interest.name: Provo City Temple
interest.description: A nice temple within the city urban area of Provo.

interest.name: Y Mountain
interest.description: A fun mountain to hike with a signature Y on it.

interest.name: Provo Canyon
interest.address: 2487 E Provo Canyon Rd, Provo UT
interest.description: A scenic drive on the way to Heber.

interest.name: Provo River
interest.address: 2487 E Provo Canyon Rd, Provo UT
interest.description: Lots of activities in this river that runs from the canyon through the city.

interest.name: Provo MTC
interest.description: An MTC right in Provo for training missionaries from all around.

interest.name: Squaw Peak
interest.description: Another well known mountain in Provo that populates the skyline.
